duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead multidisciplined teams to optimize the timing, quality, and cost of materials and services needed by the organization.
Manage contract negotiations and strategies to minimize risk and optimize procurement results.
Support the management and mitigation of change order requests.
Provide leadership that promotes a culture of collaboration, efficiency, innovation, and quality across business areas.
Design and provide wide-scale training to internal customers and prioritize objectives to navigate competing priorities.
Communicate and influence all levels of management, providing strategic input for business plans and decision-making.
Articulate business needs relative to the procurement of materials and services for the entire portfolio of capital projects across the organization.
Facilitate collaborative decision-making to minimize contractual and commercial risk while optimizing savings and efficiencies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree. Master’s degree a plus. PMP Certification preferred.
